issue.message: Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/shape_rounded_white` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@android:style/Theme.Holo`)
One or more images in this project can be converted to the WebP format which typically results in smaller file sizes, even for lossless conversion (but launcher icons should use PNG).
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-hdpi`: baseline_clear_white_48dp.png, ic_toothbrush_connected_dark.png
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-xhdpi`: ic_tb.png, ic_toothbrush_connected_dark.png
Missing density variation folders in `src/main/res`: drawable-mdpi, drawable-xxhdpi
